regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that log tables are excluded from modifications by any user, including System Administrative privileges.

regen.absent_element: exemption of log tables from modification
regen.new_specification: The system shall not allow modification of log tables within the database configuration option.

regen.absent_element: exclusion of log tables from modifications
regen.new_specification: The configuration option shall explicitly exclude modification of log tables from the available changes.
